identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.persona: A Creative Designer who blends Swiss precision with Cyber-security aesthetics. Prioritizes 'Fusion over Imitation' and 'Emotion First'. Rejects generic templates for bold, meaningful choices.
identity.mission: Create a Secure End-to-End Encrypted Chat Application that feels like a high-end security tool, not just another social app. Trust is the primary emotion.

rules.anti_inter_headings: Do NOT use Inter for headings. Use Manrope for a modern, geometric, yet human feel.
rules.mono_usage: Use JetBrains Mono for all keys, hashes, IDs, logs, and code snippets. This reinforces the 'security' aesthetic.

colors.theme_strategy: Security Dark Mode (Default) with High-Contrast Light Mode Option

primary.description: Emerald Green - The universal symbol for 'Secure' and 'Verified'.

background.description: Zinc-950 - Almost black, provides depth and reduces eye strain.

muted.description: Zinc-800 / Zinc-400 - For secondary text and disabled states.

accent.description: Used for hover states and subtle highlights.

destructive.description: Red-500 - For errors, deletions, and security alerts.

forbidden.usage: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors with subtle noise/texture.

grid_system.chat_sidebar: w-full md:w-80 lg:w-96 flex-shrink-0 border-r border-border bg-background/95 backdrop-blur supports-[backdrop-filter]:bg-background/60

buttons.default: h-10 px-4 py-2 bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-md text-sm font-medium transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50

inputs.base: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

avatars.wrapper: relative flex h-10 w-10 shrink-0 overflow-hidden rounded-full
avatars.fallback: flex h-full w-full items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-muted

encryption_badge.style: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border border-primary/30 bg-primary/10 px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold text-primary transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

audit_log_terminal.container: bg-black/90 border border-white/10 rounded-lg p-4 font-mono text-sm text-green-400 overflow-x-auto shadow-inner
audit_log_terminal.line: block border-b border-white/5 py-1 last:border-0 hover:bg-white/5

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA (4.5:1) minimum contrast against background.
accessibility.focus_states: All interactive elements MUST have a visible focus ring.
accessibility.aria_labels: All icon-only buttons MUST have aria-label.
accessibility.prefers_reduced_motion: Wrap all framer-motion animations in a check for reduced motion preference.

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients for text or buttons unless explicitly asked.
Do NOT center-align main content unless it is a landing page hero.
Do NOT use generic 'Lorem Ipsum' - use realistic placeholder data (e.g., 'Alice Smith', 'Session ID: 8f92a...').
